title: Hayli Gubbi’s Explosive First Impression
description: In its first documented eruption, the Ethiopian volcano sent a plume of gas and ash drifting across continents.
content: On November 23, 2025, the Hayli Gubbi volcano in northern Ethiopia erupted in dramatic fashion. The shield volcano in the Danakil (or Afar) Depression began spewing ash and volcanic gases at around 1… [+4077 chars]
de: Hayli Gubbis explosiver erster Eindruck. Bei seinem ersten dokumentierten Ausbruch schickte der äthiopische Vulkan eine Gas- und Aschewolke über Kontinente hinweg.
en: Hayli Gubbi’s Explosive First Impression. In its first documented eruption, the Ethiopian volcano sent a plume of gas and ash drifting across continents.
la: Hayli Gubbi Impressio Explosivae Prima. In prima eruptione documentorum, Volcanus Aethiops plumam gasorum et cinerum per continentes trudunt.

title: Unknown volcano eruption claimed as cause of Black Death
description: Though its route through Central Asia remains elusive, two German researchers believe they have discovered how — and why — the plague made it to Medieval Europe.
content:
A climate catastrophe that forced a rethink in trade routes was probably responsible for introducing the plague to Europe and causing the Black Death in the 14th century, researchers suggest.
Publis… [+5268 chars]
de: Unbekannter Vulkanausbruch gilt als Ursache für den Schwarzen Tod. Auch wenn ihr Weg durch Zentralasien noch unklar ist, glauben zwei deutsche Forscher herausgefunden zu haben, wie – und warum – die Pest ins mittelalterliche Europa gelangte.
en: Unknown volcano eruption claimed as cause of Black Death. Though its route through Central Asia remains elusive, two German researchers believe they have discovered how — and why — the plague made it to Medieval Europe.
la: Ignota eruptio vulcanus causam mortis nigrae petita est. Cum iter eius per Mediam Asiam fallax manet, duo inquisitores Germani credunt se invenisse quomodo — et quare — pestis in Europam Mediaevalem facta est.
